name: Bomb Drop #HighJam
description:
One of my entries in to the Highsight Game Jam # 1.  Where Jammers must re-imagine the game-play mechanics of at least 1 Atari 2600 game.

This is my remake of the classic game Canyon Bomber Written by David Crane in 1979. Build time 16 hours 

Use your limited bombs to clear the canyon of boulders.
At lest one player must clear the level to move to the next.

Currently there are just three levels. More will be added soon.
  
Player One use Z to drop bombs.
Player Two use M to drop bombs.
